# Black Luminary, Pitch (WondArch)
## Overview
**Black Luminary, Pitch:** This large (4-foot-wide) steel half-orb sheds *[[Deeper Darkness (Spell)|deeper darkness]]* in a 60-foot radius around itself. The creator of the orb can choose to include a shutter that will block the darkness when closed.

*Caster Level:* 5th; Prerequisites: [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Deeper Darkness (Spell)|deeper darkness]]**; Market Price:* 15,000 gp.

**Source:** Stronghold Builders Guidebook (WotC), pg. 71
